page.title: 04Farming In The Area.
page.content:
Families living here are almost entirely on farms other than a few service jobs &the occasional commuting incomer.Traditional stone & lime farm houses over 100 years old have been recently modernised. Most of the population have been brought up locally within the farming community. Many young adults must leave for work. Crops are barley,turnips,grass/hay, kale &potatoes.Altitude 900/1200'gives short growing season.Tractors,lorries landrovers,&cars are used for business & access to local towns & amenities.
The Kindie Burn runs bye the door, The wild flowers all in bloom, And wha wid leave this bonny glen, Tae wander through a toon.
